intro: Isertia juruana, commonly known as the golden star vine, is a flowering plant native to the Amazon rainforest. It is characterized by its trailing growth habit and clusters of small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom throughout the year. The plant has elliptical,革质 (leathery) leaves that are arranged alternately along the stems. It is often found growing along forest edges and in moist, shaded areas. Isertia juruana is valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes used in traditional medicine.
